snippet: The police say a man terrorized riders aboard a San Antonio transit bus before shooting one man dead Tuesday afternoon north of downtown.
abstract: Texas police say man terrorized riders aboard San Antonio transit bus before shooting one man dead.
lead_paragraph: The police say a man terrorized riders aboard a San Antonio transit bus before shooting one man dead Tuesday afternoon north of downtown.

headline.main: Texas: Man Is Shot to Death on Bus
headline.print_headline: Texas: Man Is Shot to Death on Bus
